description: Updates the specified safety lever state.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the safety lever.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state of the safety lever. The updated state of the safety lever. The reason for updating the state of the safety lever.

nested_params.name: status
nested_params.description: The updated state of the safety lever.

nested_params.name: reason
nested_params.description: The reason for updating the state of the safety lever.

nested_items.name: id

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the safety lever.
